channel.title: [317] Improving TestScape
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm currently refactoring and attempting to improve a TestScape source to help me learn Java, Java design patterns and how the private server works.
Currently, I have a few major improvements I want to add in the future:
[ul][li]A move to Apache MINA or better socket library.[/li] [li]Change from process() methods to an event handler / queue.[/li][/ul]
What else could be improved in TestScape (in terms of basic workings of the server, not things like buggy skills or combat)?
